clinical_history: Patient with unexplained weight loss and fever.
findings: No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Focal uptake in bone marrow consistent with post-surgical changes.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in bone marrow, suggestive of malignancy.
recommendations: Biopsy or follow-up imaging may be considered to confirm malignancy.
